channel.description: physics.hist-ph updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: From Many Models to ONE THEORY
item.description: arXiv:2501.10233v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: The year 2024 marks two anniversaries: The 70th anniversary of CERN and the 50th anniversary of the $J/\Psi$ discovery. At this occasion I have been asked to give review talks on the significance of these anniversaries. This article is an expanded version of these talks.
item.dc:creator: J. Iliopoulos
